review: Possibly the best media player value out there. With the ability to install apps like XBMC, this small device can take care of almost of your needs. If you want a better gaming device, then get the more expensive version but most people will be fine with this.

review: Not at many free Prime items as I thought there would be. But for $39, it's worth it.

review: It doesn't offer much more than my smart tv, but it's a whole lot faster!

review: Exceeded my expectations!! Very easy to install and get started. I've already recommend this to all of my coworkers!!

review: Super easy to use and comes already setup, so basically plug and play. I'm very pleased with it, and it shipped a month earlier than originally estimated.
